text: When I was younger I was really nerdy.
I had really round Harry Potter-looking glasses.
I was a bit of a shy person.

I would be just like a little mouse, really
quiet.
But I would participate in sports.
And once I did that I felt more confident.

And I felt a sense of achievement that, you
know what, I can do this and I can do so many

You know your body can do this much, but if
you feel like you can, if you believe you

can, next time you can push yourself to do
more.

To me, personally, beauty is when you're humble,
and your'e confident, and you allow other
people to see you for who you really are.
That's when someone is truly beautiful.
